name: Dropping Into Work
description:
Will you lose horribly or just lose? Find out in our new 3D interactive fiction game!

How to play

Move the player with the AWSD keys and rotate the camera with the mouse. Left-click with the mouse to select objects.

Credits

Programming

Contents warnings (SPOILERS)

  • Class warfare
  • Death (Poison / Crushing / Allergic / Unexplained)
  • Futility
  • Isolation

(The issue where you can fall out of the world in certain places is known but shouldn't affect your enjoyment, hopefully)
